title: Cloudbuilt-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

Cloudbuilt

Release Date: 3/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

A young woman, a mysterious world and dark clouds on the
horizon... welcome to Cloudbuilt

Cloudbuilt sees quick wits and even quicker reflexes become
your closest friends as you carve your own path through the
mysterious floating ruins high above the clouds. A game of
speed, precision and freedom, use your rocket-powered
exoskeleton and manipulate the laws of physics to avoid
fatal hazards, dodge hostile robots and reach not just the
finish line of each stage, but the top of the worldwide
leaderboards too

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup and install the game
Copy Crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

Notes: The Game has been updated to 1.035 already
We noticed display problems on AMD Radeon based
cards still .. (misaligned menu items etc..)

CODEX is currently looking for:

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS 02/2014


System Requirements:

OS: Windows 7 
Processor: 2GHz Intel Dual Core processor 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: 512 MB OpenGL 3.2 compatible card 
Hard Drive: 3 GB available space 
Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard
